 Basic Eligibility Criteria:A candidate who has Passed in 2nd PUC / 12 Std / Equivalent Examination with English as one of the Language and obtained a Minimum of 45% of Marks in aggregate in Physics and Mathematics as compulsory subjects along
 with Chemistry / Bio Technology / Biology / Computer Science / Electronics as optional subjects in the qualifying examination is eligible to pursue in under graduate programs (BE).

responses:
Our college has different teaching patterns than other colleges of India, following the LTW techniques which stands for Lecture, Tutorial and Workshop.
You can provide us with your contact details and our counselors shall reach out to you and provide you with further details.

At our college, we prioritize interactive and student-centered learning. Professors often use a combination of lectures, discussions, hands-on projects, and technology-enhanced methods to engage students in the learning process.
Our teaching style emphasizes active learning, critical thinking, and practical application of knowledge. Professors encourage student participation and provide a dynamic classroom experience.
We promote a learner-centric approach to education, fostering a collaborative and engaging learning environment. Professors employ diverse teaching methods to cater to various learning styles.
The teaching style here is characterized by a blend of traditional teaching methods and modern, technology-driven approaches. Students can expect a rich and interactive classroom experience.
Our college adopts a holistic teaching approach, encouraging students to explore, question, and apply knowledge. Professors are dedicated to helping students succeed in their academic journey.

patterns: What companies visit for campus placements?

How successful are students in finding jobs?

responses: Our college hosts visits from a wide range of companies during campus placements. Renowned companies across various industries recruit our students for internships and full-time positions.

Internship opportunities are an integral part of our curriculum, allowing students to gain practical experience. The college offers career counseling, resume building, and interview preparation to support students in their job search.
We have numerous success stories of recent graduates who have secured positions in leading companies. Our career development services assist students in achieving their career goals.
The average salary offered to our graduates varies by program and industry. Detailed placement data, including salary statistics, can be found on our official website.
Our placement cell plays a crucial role in connecting students with potential employers. They organize recruitment drives, facilitate mock interviews, and provide valuable career guidance.

We offer a range of resources for job-seeking students, including access to job boards, networking events, and alumni connections. Our goal is to ensure our students have the support they need for a successful career.

Our college has a strong record of placement opportunities for students. Graduates have been successfully placed in various reputed companies. Detailed placement statistics and information are available on our website.

The college's placement cell works diligently to provide students with excellent career opportunities. You can find comprehensive information about placements, including company profiles and recruitment processes, on our official website.
